attributes.action: Seizure of Sultan Hassanal Bolkiah UK based assets, crimes against human rights
attributes.background: Sultan of Brunei have recently passed new law meaning homosexuality is to carry a death sentence of death by stoning. The Sultan also owns some of the world's top hotels such as the Dorchester in London. Is it not reasonable for these UK assets to be seized for such barbaric acts?

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament is not responsible for seizing the assets of people.

You might like to sign this petition instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/253261
